meanings.definition: The quality of being timid or cowardly.
meanings.sent1: His pusillanimity prevented him from standing up to the bully.
meanings.sent2: Her pusillanimity made her avoid confrontations at all costs.
meanings.sent3: Despite his pusillanimity, he managed to muster the courage to speak up in the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The shadow of pusillanimity followed him like a dark cloud, hindering his progress.
meanings.sent5: The pusillanimity in his eyes was evident as he hesitated to take the first step.

meanings.sent1: The team's pusillanimity in the face of adversity disappointed their coach.
meanings.sent2: Overcoming her pusillanimity, she decided to pursue her dreams with unwavering determination.
meanings.sent3: His pusillanimity in the game was so extreme that even the opponents felt sorry for him.
meanings.sent4: The weight of his pusillanimity felt heavier than any physical burden he had ever carried.
meanings.sent5: The pusillanimity in his voice was palpable as he struggled to make a firm decision.
